Our goal?

YouthSpace is created to face the challenges of millennial generation by discussing with fellow users    that is, discuss what challenges they are facing and find ways to face those challenges    through advice from fellow users who have successfully faced challenges, YouthSpace also provides inspiration    through reading media that are shared by users and uploaded by the admin through their success stories    successfully completed the challenge.

goals can inspire millennial generation to deal with challenges and challenges    Finishing the challenge and achieving a success, Youtspace also provides the latest news with the aim    can add to the knowledge and insight of millennial generation regarding, education, technology, nature and lifestyle

To help millennials solve the challenges they are facing, provide inspiration that is shared by users who have succeeded in facing challenges shared by users who have successfully faced challenges, as well as helping to add insight through the latest news uploaded by the admin.

What we do?

Providing discussion space for young people who want to find solutions to face challenges, and Youthspace also provides an inspiration room where there are some inspirations uploaded by people who have successfully faced challenges, we also provide videos such as video seminars that share tips on how to deal with a problem millennial generation, we also share the latest news about millennial generation or generation activities

helping millennials solve the challenges they are facing by providing a discussion room, providing inspiration shared by users who have successfully overcome challenges and helping to add insight through the latest news that is uploaded by the admin.

YouthSpace

To help face challenges by discussing and also getting inspiration along with the latest news about the millennial generation today
